    • Birmingham, AL, USA

    Refactor Your Wetware

    less than 1 minute read

    I am reading an interesting book - Pragmatic Thinking and Learning: Refactor Your Wetware by Andy Hunt that came out in September 2008.  The book works through a collection of science associated with the brain in a very readable manner with the goal that by understanding how the brain works, one can improve their thinking skills.  Lots of interesting ideas to consider applying.

    Categories: book

    Updated: December 17, 2008
